text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the author has no statutory right to set or veto the public retail price, and that authority lies with the publisher under France\u2019s fixed-price laws. No fixed rules: There's no law dictating how book prices must be split between author and publisher\" and \"You can negotiate: ... The retail price itself\".
